entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023
